name: Reyong Bali VR
description:
Reyong Bali VR , is a musical instrument used in Balinese gamelan. Reyong is beaten by more than one player with a beat on the right and left hands. Each player plays a gong that produces several different notes so that the game is played alternately.. You playing game with “Panggul”, panggul as Stick Drum. In Game there is a video tutorial or you can watch it on Youtube with your other device. For reset position camera press “dash” using dash menu on oculus. At Gameplay you press “Menu Button” for have controller for pause, and show video tutorial and show pause menu and show tutorial playing traditional music Reyong bali music instrumental.

Support Devices Oculus Rift/S
